name: opelxpii
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

stmt.origin: mp2an(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c3))

body.origin:
|- wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3))
-| wcel(c0, c2)
-| wcel(c1, c3)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c3)), wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3))
-| wcel(c0, c2)
-| wcel(c1, c3)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c3)), wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c3)), wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3))
-| wcel(c0, c2)
-| wcel(c1, c3)

comment: Ordered pair membership in a Cartesian product (implication). (Contributed by Steven Nguyen, 17-Jul-2022.)
